data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions For The Half Year Ended 31St  March, 2022 Pursuant To Regulation 23(9) Of Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find the below mentioned disclosure of Related Party Transactions for the period from October 01, 2021 to March 31, 2022.

data.caption: Pursuant To Regulation 33 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, The Board Of Directors At Its Meeting Held Today, I.E. 30Th Of May 2022, Has Inter Alia, Considered And Approved The Following: Audited Financial Results (Standalone) Of The Company, For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended 31St March, 2022 Along With The Statement Of Assets And Liabilities And Auditors' Report And Declaration On Audit Report With An Unmodified Opinion By M/S. Suresh Kumar
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the Board of Directors at its Meeting held today, i.e. 30th of May 2022, has inter alia, considered and approved the following:

Audited Financial Results (Standalone) of the Company, for the quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2022 along with the Statement of Assets and Liabilities and Auditors' Report and declaration on audit report with an unmodified opinion by M/s. Suresh Kumar Mittal & Co., Statutory Auditor of the Company are enclosed herewith for your record.

data.caption: Regulation 33 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, Please Find Enclosed Herewith Copy Of Un-Audited Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Nine Month Ended 31St December, 2021
data.news_body:
Please be informed that pursuant to Regulation 30 and other applicable provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 this is to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company was held today i.e. 14th February, 2022 and the following matters were transacted / noted:

Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith copy of Un-audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine month ended 31st December, 2021 which has been approved by the Board of Directors at its meeting held today along with the Limited Review Report.

The said Unaudited Financial Results along with the Limited Review Report issued by M/s. Suresh Kumar Mittal & Co. Statutory Auditors of the Company are enclosed herewith.

The meeting of Board of Directors commenced at 1.00 p.m. and concluded at 2.30 p.m.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Under Regulation 29 (1) (A) And Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body:
Please be informed that pursuant to Regulation 30 and other applicable provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 this is to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company was held today i.e. 14th February, 2022 and the following matters were transacted / noted:

Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith copy of Un-audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine month ended 31st December, 2021 which has been approved by the Board of Directors at its meeting held today along with the Limited Review Report.

The said Unaudited Financial Results along with the Limited Review Report issued by M/s. Suresh Kumar Mittal & Co. Statutory Auditors of the Company are enclosed herewith.

The meeting of Board of Directors commenced at 1.00 p.m. and concluded at 2.30 p.m.

This is for your information and records.

data.news_body: Disclosure of Related Party Transactions for the half year ended 30th September, 2021 pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Under Regulation 29 (1) (A) And Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith copy of Un-audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2021 which has been approved by the Board of Directors at its meeting held today along with the Limited Review Report.
With reference to the captioned subject, we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today, i.e. on 13th November, 2021 has accepted and taken on record the resignation of Mr. Mahesh Jhawar (Membership No. A58438), Company Secretary and Compliance Officer and also approved the appointment of Mr. Rahul Jaiswal (Membership No. A37393) as the Company Secretary & Compliance Officer of the Company with immediate effect in place of Mr. Mahesh Jhawar.
